price: 15. Waxaana uga tagnay si ay u ahaato Calaamad (lagu waantoobo), ee ma jiraa mid ku waantoobi?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
